section.title:
variances material usage by w/o
work orders material usage variances for
material usage variances w/o details for Material Usage Variance by Work Order
section.para: To view material usage variances by Work Order, select the "Material Usage Variance by Work Order" option. The following screen will appear:

mediaobject.caption: Material Usage Variance by Work Order

section.para: When displaying material usage variances by Work Order, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Enter the Work Order Number of the Work Order whose material usage variances you want to view.
Displays Warehouse code automatically when Work Order Number is entered into "Work Order #" field.
Displays Item Number automatically when Work Order Number is entered into "Work Order #" field.
Displays Work Order Status automatically when Work Order Number is entered into "Work Order #" field.
Display lists material usage variances by Work Order, using the specified parameters.

section.para: To the far right of the screen, the following buttons are available:

listitem.para: Closes the screen, returning you to the application desktop.
Runs the report associated with this screen.
